data.name:
Digital Marketing For
Business & Career
Growth
data.summary: This webinar will be your starting point to embark upon your Journey to be a Digital Marketer. From giving you vivid insights about the landscape of Digital Marketing, its uses, advantages and opportunities, you will be introduced to the roles, activities and expected salaries in Digital Marketing. Not only that, you will be made to try out working with Facebook Ads & Google Analytics in the session
